posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jonathan Rundlett
This item is page 9 from the "Goodwin Tobacco Baseball Album: Champions 1888".  It features 4 hall of famers from the 1888 World Champion New York Giants including Mickey Welch, J.M. Ward, William "Buck" Ewing and Tim Keefe.  This album is one of the earliest redemption pieces as it was forwarded to people who collected 75 tickets from cigarette packs in 1889.  

Please let me know if interested.  I can forward scans to anyone interested.

Posted By: Donald Miller
Hello,
   Could you send scans and price please? Thanks 

Don Miller     email rellim@abe.midco.net

Posted By: Jonathan Rundlett
I have sent a scan to you.  I tried to include a scan in this posting but the scan that I have in my computer at work is too large for this site.  I will be more than happy to send a scan to anyone interested.

Thanks for the interest.
